item.title: Sources: Antiuniversity of Feminism
item.description: Founded in 2021, Antiuniversity of Feminism is a grassroots project aimed at creating a safe space for women and people with all gender identities to learn about feminism and gender theory. Antiuniversity offers free online courses in Kyrgyz. The project was founded and created by Elvira Tilek.

item.title: Sources: Adilet.Zan
item.description: Founded in 2012, Adilet.Zan is a legal information system of Regulatory Legal Acts under the Ministry of Justice Institute of Legislation and Legal Information. The database contains more than 330 thousand legal documents, including Kazakhstan’s Concept of Family and Gender Policies.

item.title: Sources: Artyq Emes
item.description: Founded in 2021, Artyq Emes is a human rights project that researches fat phobia and fat-shaming in Kazakhstan. Available in Kazakh and Russian on Instagram and YouTube.

item.title: Sources: Batyr Jamal
item.description: Founded in 2021, Batyr Jamal is a women-oriented media with coverage primarily focusing on women’s rights, safety, and self-worth. Available on Instagram and Telegram.

item.title: Sources: Human Rights KZ
item.description: Founded in 2021, Human Rights KZ is dedicated to sharing domestic and international human rights information and news in Kazakh. Available on Instagram.

item.title: Sources: Masa Media
item.description: Founded in 2021, Masa Media strives to explain political, legal, and legislative systems in Kazakhstan.

item.title: Sources: Schitaetsya
item.description: Founded in 2021, Schitaetsya is a collaborative project by the Kaz Fem feminist organization and other experts and organization to collect accurate information about domestic violence in Kazakhstan and provide informational resources for victims of domestic abuse.

item.title: Sources: UN Kazakhstan Annual Report 2021
item.description:
Pages 24-27 of the UN Kazakhstan Annual Report 2021 summarize the UN’s efforts in fostering gender equality and human rights development in Kazakhstan.

Methodological note and information on data collection are not available.
